content.rendered:
Shamrock Roofing & Construction does so much more than just put your multi-family building back into top shape. We offer full restoration and general contracting services for all multi-family dwellings. Whether it’s an apartment condo, townhouse, or a duplex, our team works with precision and speed to restore, repair, or replace based on what’s needed. We keep you informed the whole way through, helping with insurance reimbursement questions and providing the customer support you deserve.

Why choose Shamrock over another apartment roofing company?

– We stand by our motto, “Service before Self”. We do not compromise on quality over cost and we get the job done right the first time.

– As a master commercial roofing company, we can offer premium warranties that many other roofing companies are not able to provide.

– Shamrock Roofing & Construction utilizes the latest technology platforms such as Xactimate to provide quick, accurate and detailed estimates, and Eagle View to provide aerial photography and assessments.

– Our management team has over 40 years of experience in the roofing and insurance industries.

– The Shamrock team of highly trained professionals are experts in restoration and all types of roofing installations and repairs.  

– Our reputation for quality workmanship, attention to detail backed by exceptional customer service speaks for itself—we are proud to consistently receive four and five-star reviews from our happy customers!

Locations We Serve
